en.pageTitle: Football Emojis ⚽ Copy and Paste - LaughingEmoji.net
en.metaDescription: Copy and paste popular football emojis ⚽🏈🏟️ from the largest collection. One-click copy for all your sports expressions!
en.ogTitle: Football Emojis ⚽ Copy and Paste - LaughingEmoji.net
en.ogDescription: The ultimate collection of football emojis! Copy and paste ⚽🏈🏟️ and more sports-related emojis with one click.
en.clickToCopy: Click any emoji to copy to clipboard!
en.exploreDescription: Explore and copy a diverse collection of football emojis for your messages and social media.
en.footerDescription: Your ultimate resource for football emojis. Discover, copy, and share the perfect sports emoticon for any occasion.
en.meaningSoccerBall: ⚽: Represents soccer, football, a match, or a goal.
en.meaningAmericanFootball: 🏈: Represents American football, a game, or a touchdown.
en.meaningStadium: 🏟️: Represents a stadium, arena, or a major sporting event.
en.meaningGoalNet: 🥅: Represents a goal, a net, or the act of scoring.
en.meaningTrophy: 🏆: Represents a trophy, a win, or a championship.
en.usageSoccer: Use ⚽ to talk about a soccer game, a European football match, or supporting your favorite team.
en.usageAmericanFootball: Use 🏈 for discussing an NFL game, fantasy football, or Super Bowl plans.
en.usageCelebration: Use 🏆 when celebrating a win, a successful achievement, or a championship.
en.historySoccerBall: The ⚽ emoji was approved as part of Unicode 5.2 in 2009 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.
en.historyAmericanFootball: The 🏈 emoji was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.
en.historyTrophy: The 🏆 emoji was also added in Unicode 6.0 and is one of the most used emojis to signify victory.
en.storyWorldCup: During the World Cup, the ⚽ emoji becomes one of the most frequently used symbols on social media worldwide.

zh.pageTitle: 足球表情符号 ⚽ 复制粘贴 - LaughingEmoji.net
zh.metaDescription: 从最大的集合中复制粘贴流行的足球表情符号⚽🏈🏟️。一键复制，满足您所有体育表达！
zh.ogTitle: 足球表情符号 ⚽ 复制粘贴 - LaughingEmoji.net
zh.ogDescription: 足球表情符号的终极集合！一键复制粘贴⚽🏈🏟️等更多与体育相关的表情符号。
zh.mainTitle: 足球表情符号 ⚽ 复制粘贴 🏈
zh.clickToCopy: 点击任意表情符号即可复制到剪贴板！
zh.exploreDescription: 探索并复制各种足球表情符号，用于您的消息和社交媒体。
zh.footerDescription: 您获取足球表情符号的终极资源。发现、复制和分享适合任何场合的完美体育表情符号。
zh.usageSectionTitle: 足球表情符号的使用场景
zh.historySectionTitle: 足球表情符号的发展历史
zh.storiesSectionTitle: 足球表情符号的趣闻故事
zh.meaningAmericanFootball: 🏈: 代表美式橄榄球、比赛或达阵。
zh.meaningStadium: 🏟️: 代表体育场、竞技场或大型体育赛事。
zh.meaningGoalNet: 🥅: 代表球门、球网或得分的动作。
zh.usageSoccer: 使用⚽来谈论足球比赛，或支持你最喜欢的球队。
zh.usageAmericanFootball: 使用🏈来讨论NFL比赛、梦幻橄榄球或超级碗计划。
zh.usageCelebration: 在庆祝胜利、成功或赢得冠军时使用🏆。
zh.historySoccerBall: ⚽表情符号在2009年作为Unicode 5.2的一部分被批准，并于2015年添加到Emoji 1.0中。
zh.historyAmericanFootball: 🏈表情符号在2010年作为Unicode 6.0的一部分被批准，并于2015年添加到Emoji 1.0中。
zh.historyTrophy: 🏆表情符号也添加到Unicode 6.0中，是表示胜利最常用的表情符号之一。
zh.storyWorldCup: 在世界杯期间，⚽表情符号成为全球社交媒体上使用最频繁的符号之一。
